title: 72/128. Observer status for the Fund for the Development of the Indigenous Peoples of Latin America and the Caribbean in the General Assembly

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Fund for the Development of the Indigenous Peoples of Latin America and the Caribbean to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
